text: Hi, im new here, im a designer and i need to make some modification on the website i have to maintain, how can i create a module? or how can i understand the code (i know html, css, bootstrap) but i dont understand the hubl at all.

I was curious, if I had a file that was deleted in the DM, it still shows up in recently deleted, but if I am referencing that deleted file, HS still loads in that deleted file, if I want to keep the reference of that file but remove the history of that file ever existing, how do I do that? I do I removed the “Recently Deleted Files” so they never existed so they do not pull in, the message that appears on the line of code is:
Hi, is there a chance to use SCSS or LESS on the CSS styling? Or we are strict attached to CSS no matter what?

In the design manager, yes, it’s CSS only.

If you move to the Command Line Interface, you can use whatever preprocessing you would like
but that's still on Beta, that means that not always will work or what does that mean? I just want to be confident it won't produce unexpected errors when working for a production site
you can run your own git repo, and you can setup a workflow to compile your scss/less and then copy and paste that to the window if that makes you happier
I'd consider the workflow to work really well
It’s in Beta, but it definitely works
I know there’s at least a few of us using it in production already
